description: The New England Patriots are given a pre-Super Bowl rude awakening as a hotel fire alarm goes off during the night.
title: Super Bowl: Fire alarm gives New England Patriots rude awakening
title_page: Super Bowl: Fire alarm gives New England Patriots rude awakening - BBC Sport
